description: Get IP address information from the Shodan InternetDB.
readme:
# Zeek InternetDB plugin
==================================================================

## Requirements
- Zeek installed: https://docs.zeek.org/en/master/install.html
- **Note**:  adjust the PATH environment to the Zeek directory
`export PATH=/usr/local/zeek/bin:$PATH`

## Installation
- Download source code from git reporsity:
`git clone https://gitlab.com/shodan-public/shodan-zeek.git`
- Configure and Builidng:
`./configure 
make 
make install`
* Dowloading the InternetDB Sqlite (option for *lookup_internet_db* function)
**Note**: using root privilege when running configure and install.
* Write some scripts:
```
# File "test_internetdb.zeek"
event zeek_init()
    {
        print InternetDB::lookup_internetdb_api(1.1.1.1);
        print InternetDB::lookup_internetdb_sqlite(1.1.1.1);
    }
```
And run it:
```
zeek hello.zeek
```

## Development
Directory structions:
* **scripts/**: When the plugin gets activated, this directory will be automatically added to ZEEKPATH, so that any scripts/modules inside can be loaded.
* **src/**: C++ code and single-header that need to be loaded for the main function. **_.bif_** file is where the main function is written.
* **tests/**: basic BTest to exercise plugin functionality.

We welcome any contributions. Or if you have any requested or issues, please let us know.
